title: Can I copy multiple contacts from the phone to the USIM card at a time? If yes, after I doing so, the number of contacts saved to the USIM card is less than that copied from the phone. Why?
answer:
Yes, you can copy multiple contacts from the phone to the USIM card at a time.

If the USIM card contains contacts with the same names as those copied from the phone, the contacts will be merged. In this case, the number of contacts saved to the USIM card is less than that copied from the phone.
